title: Successful Candidate Application Flow
steps: Open the public link
Fill in the application form with valid data
Submit the application
Verify the application is received by the system
expected_result: The candidate's application is successfully submitted and visible in the responses tab

title: View Structured Answers and Video Recordings
steps: Open the responses tab
Click on a candidate's response
Verify structured answers and video recordings are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's structured answers and video recordings are displayed

title: View AI Analyze Scores
steps: Open the interview screenings section
Click on a candidate's interview
Verify AI analyze scores are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's AI analyze scores are displayed

title: Reject or Select Candidate
steps: Open the responses tab
Click on a candidate's response
Verify the action button to select or reject the candidate is available
expected_result: The action button to select or reject the candidate is displayed

title: Resume Screening with AI Recommendations
steps: Create an interview and upload resumes
Verify the AI screening process initiates
Verify resumes are assigned a score based on skills and experience
expected_result: The AI provides a realistic assessment of the candidates' experience in relation to the job description

title: Invalid Data in Application Form
steps: Open the public link
Fill in the application form with invalid data (e.g. invalid email)
Submit the application
Verify an error message is displayed
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating invalid data

title: Network Error during Application Submission
steps: Open the public link
Fill in the application form with valid data
Simulate a network error during submission
Verify an error message is displayed
expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating a network error

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility: Public Link
steps: Open the public link in different browsers (e.g. Chrome, Firefox, Edge)
Verify the link is accessible and functional in each browser
expected_result: The public link is accessible and functional in each browser

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility: Responses Tab
steps: Open the responses tab in different browsers (e.g. Chrome, Firefox, Edge)
Verify the responses tab is accessible and functional in each browser
expected_result: The responses tab is accessible and functional in each browser

title: Mobile Responsiveness: Public Link
steps: Open the public link on a mobile device
Verify the link is accessible and functional on mobile
expected_result: The public link is accessible and functional on mobile

title: Accessibility: Screen Reader Compatibility
steps: Open the public link with a screen reader
Verify the content is accessible and readable with a screen reader
expected_result: The content is accessible and readable with a screen reader

title: Performance: Fast Response Times
steps: Open the public link
Verify the response time is under 3 seconds
expected_result: The response time is under 3 seconds
performance: Response time should be under 3 seconds
